Minister.Text: Introduced by the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance

CIF.Text: CIF, 2021, c. 7, ss. 1 to 3, 5 to 8 and 10 to 19 in force on assent 06.05.2021

Item.Text: — s. 4(1) deemed to have come into force on 27.09.2020 see s. 4(2)
— s. 9 is deemed to have come into force on 02.10.2020 see s. 11
